dmca.title: [EV1-C1473153A] Copyright Infringment
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Saturday, October 21, 2006 11:59 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1473153A] Copyright Infringment Subject: [EV1-C1473153A] Copyright Infringment ==== Original Message ==== (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To Whom It May Concern: We are Caltex Records based in Los Angeles. One of your clients "MUSIC.TIRIP.COM" has been placing our musical copyrighted materials on his site for downloading, streaming, etc. with no permission from us. Therefore; we request immediate cease of use of our copyrighted materials in their site, which is hosted by you. Best regards, Mehrdad Pakravan Caltex Records 9045-A Eton Avenue Canoga Park, CA 91304 USA Tel: 818-700-8657 Offices Cell: 818-445-1710 Fax: 818-700-0285 Email: mehrdad@caltexrecords.com MIME element (text/html)
To Whom It May Concern:
 
We are Caltex Records based in Los Angeles. One of your clients "MUSIC.TIRIP.COM" has been placing our musical copyrighted materials on his site for downloading, streaming, etc. with no permission from us.
 
Therefore; we request immediate cease of use of our copyrighted materials in their site, which is hosted by you.
 
Best regards,
Mehrdad Pakravan
Caltex Records
9045-A Eton Avenue
Canoga Park, CA 91304
USA
Tel: 818-700-8657 Offices
Cell: 818-445-1710
Fax: 818-700-0285
Email: mehrdad@caltexrecords.com
MIME element (text/plain)
